q: . Back in October, The Blaze reported that Indiana Republican Congressman Mike Pence was considering stepping down from his post as House Republican Chairman in order to run for president in 2012. Similarly, Politico wrote, Mike Pence , a darling of the conservative movement, would leave the leadership job with a blunt explanation to colleagues that he can't commit to a two-year term in House leadership, a source familiar with his deliberations. Mike Pence was the winner of a presidential straw poll at the Values Voter Summit in Washington, D.C. Mike Pence edged out Mike Huckabee , former Massachusetts governor Mitt Romney , former House Speaker Newt Gingrich , and Sarah Palin .

Grand Caravan and Chrysler Town and Country this week. Chrysler is debating the future of its minivans even as it starts making the 2011 Dodge Grand Caravan and Chrysler Town and Country this week. We need to completely rethink the minivan, CEO Sergio Marchionne said Tuesday at the Canadian plant where Chrysler's minivans are made.`` We need to retain all its functionality but make it much more versatile.'' Sergey Brin for a long time to come.'' Page praised Eric Schmidt for doing an outstanding job leading Google as CEO.`` The results speak for themselves,'' Page said in a statement. There is no other CEO in the world that could have kept such headstrong founders so deeply involved and still run the business so brilliantly. Eric Schmidt is a tremendous leader and I have learned innumerable lessons from him. His advice and efforts will be invaluable to me as I start in this new role. Google still has such incredible opportunity-- we are only at the beginning and I can't wait to get started. Before Eric Schmidt was hired in April 2001, Page was Google's CEO.

Windows tablets- a`` slew of them''- will be unveiled by Microsoft CEO Steve Ballmer at the 2011 Consumer Electronics Show, according to an article today in the New York Times. Citing people familiar with Microsoft's plans, the Times reports that several manufacturers have signed up to build Windows tablets, including Dell and Samsung.
